    • Uses of IFontManager in org.openscience.cdk.renderer.visitor

      Methods in org.openscience.cdk.renderer.visitor with parameters of type IFontManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AWTDrawVisitor.setFontManager(IFontManager fontManager)
      The font manager must be set by any renderer that uses this class! This manager is needed to keep track of fonts of the right size.
      void IDrawVisitor.setFontManager(IFontManager fontManager)
      Sets the IFontManager this IDrawVisitor should use.
